name: Greninja

passive.name: Substitute
passive.effect: Once per turn, if Greninja would take damage, you may discard a Trainer card to take half that damage.

attacks.name: Water Shuriken
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on 4 of your opponent's Pokemon.

attacks.name: Assassinate
attacks.effect: You may shuffle Greninja and all cards attached to it into your deck. If you do, Knock Out the Defending Pokemon.

flavor: Many kings guards were left useless by a small group of these elite Pokemon. It takes a long time to train them, but the results speak for themselves.
